title: Gorgeous (Captioned)
creator_credit: Sharon Connolly, Film Australia and Kaz Cooke
brief_description: Follows the perils of cartoon character Hermoine the Modern Girl as she tackles plastic surgery, beauty therapy and bulimia, in a feral fit of inadequacy. ‘Gorgeous’ asks why men and women feel insecure and what thoughts tempt them towards eating disorders and other strange eating rituals. Hermoine proves that modern girls can stop feeling inadequate and regain their self-esteem.
